data.title: Calendar of Events
data.text:
Meeting the Moment Part One: Philanthropic Vehicles to Fund Democracy - A Webinar Hosted by NCFP

Join us for our upcoming Fundamentals of Family Philanthropy webinar series, where we will explore the vital role family philanthropy plays in addressing pressing societal challenges and driving meaningful change.

Meeting the Moment Part Two: Effective Communication and Building Consensus through Change - A Webinar Hosted by NCFP

Join us for our upcoming Fundamentals of Family Philanthropy webinar series, where we will explore the vital role family philanthropy plays in addressing pressing societal challenges and driving meaningful change.

Performance Reviews for Changemakers: Can We Do Better?

A performance review can be defined as a formal periodic assessment of an individual employee's work performance conducted by their immediate supervisor or manager. Ideally, there is a two-way discussion that encourages the employee's perspectives...

Meeting the Moment Part Three: Trust-Based and Participatory Practices - A Webinar Hosted by NCFP

Building A Coaching Practice With Your Teams: Purpose, Strategies, and Insights

Clarity and Bravery in Times of Uncertainty - A Workshop for CEOs and Senior Programming Staff
